description: This header file defines the interface for a dispatcher component within the WPEFramework PluginHost namespace. It contains the declaration of the IDispatcher interface and its nested ICallback interface, including their virtual methods for event handling, validation, invocation, and subscription management.

classes.name: IDispatcher
classes.description: An interface representing a dispatcher that manages remote procedure calls, event dispatching, validation, and callback management within the plugin host.

classes.name: IDispatcher::ICallback
classes.description: An interface for callback handling, supporting event notification, error reporting, and subscription management for clients.

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a token for a specific method and parameters.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a method callback with provided parameters and obtains a response.

methods.name: Local
methods.description: Provides access to the local dispatcher if activated locally.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Dispatcher callback method for an event notification.

methods.name: Error
methods.description: Reports an error to the callback with channel, id, code, and message.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Sends a response for a callback with channel, id, and response string.

methods.name: Subscribe
methods.description: Subscribes to a specific event for a channel with a designator.

methods.name: Unsubscribe
methods.description: Unsubscribes from a specific event for a channel and designator.

ctags.name: ICallback
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL ICallback : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IDispatcher
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IDispatcher : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
